item.title: Find specific Azure Virutal Desktop assigned user
item.description: Recently I saw a question on X (Twitter) where someone was looking for a way to filter for a specific Azure Virtual Desktop assigned user using the Azure management API. For some reason, the filter option is not working in this API. Where in the end it was not possible to find the correct user directly from an API request. In this post, I show a different, also more efficient way, to find the correct user assigned to an Azure Virtual Desktop session host.
